parameters: \n<\N[5]>What are your talking about there bonnie lad.
\n<\N[5]>Leon was a great king, all great kings can move people just by talking.
\n<\N[1]>I believe ya mum, but I think it might of gone a bit like.
\n<\N[1]>"Stop right there villians, let our powers combine".
\n<\N[1]>And all those villians were all like.
\n<\N[1]>And then all the tribes would come together like.
\n<\N[2]>\C[13]Misses Rere\C[0], \C[13]Misses Rere\C[0] you fell asleep again.
\n<\N[5]>I got so lost in \C[13]Cherry's\C[0] story, I just drifted off there for a second.
\n<\N[5]>Right I need both you and \C[13]Blueberry\C[0] to help out \C[13]Mrs. Shiman\C[0] with her farm.
\n<\N[5]>She's getting on a bit in her old age, so we need to help her out.
\n<\N[5]>She's been good to us, so we should repay the favour.
\n<\N[3]>Ummm, I don't talk to her much.
\n<\N[2]>Don't be scared, she's \C[13]Lily's\C[0] mum and she's grand.
\n<\N[5]>I need you to go down \C[7]south\C[0] to the \C[25]Outpost\C[0] an pick up the monthly orders.
\n<\N[5]>And don't forget to tidy up your bed.
\n<\N[5]>Once the soldiers came I, I just...
\n<\N[5]>I just thought the worst had happened.
\n<\N[1]>Don't worry mum, I'l tell ya what's going on.
\n<\N[5]>I just don't understand, why are you doing this?
\n<\N[1]>It's for the good of Brassica. That should be a good enough reason.
\n<\N[5]>Still have that dream of being an adventurer.
\n<\N[5]>Still have that dream of being an adventurer.
\n<\N[5]>It's dangerous out there, you could get hurt.
\n<\N[5]>Nothing good is gonna come from becoming a soldier, you could get killed.
\n<\N[5]>But, I'm most disappointed in you Blueberry.
\n<\N[3]>I'm sorry, I just wanted to make sure they didn't get hurt.
\n<\N[3]>I thought it would've all been over once we got the \C[17]idol\C[0].
\n<\N[5]>It feels like only yesterday, you all fell into my lap.
\n<\N[2]>And we'll make sure this little cabbage doesn't get into any more trouble.
\n<\N[5]>Oh don't mind me, just looking at my old \C[25]Inn\C[0] log books.
\n<\N[1]>Yeah ha guess\.\., we kinda ruined ya business huh.
\n<\N[5]>You three were the best things that ever happened to me.
\n<\N[1]>You never did tell me how she...
\n<\N[5]>She just walked in, with you in her belly.
\n<\N[5]>The pain of giving birth was just too great.
\n<\N[5]>But if she were alive now, I'm sure she would be proud of you.
\n<\N[2]>I could only hide under the covers.
\n<\N[2]>The last thing I saw were the soldiers running in to help.

parameters.name: One Man Symphony - Royalty Free Soundtrack Collection - 98 Do You Remember Her-

parameters: \n<\N[3]>The first thing the soldiers did was protect the rich people behind us.
\n<\N[2]>How long have you been keeping this from me.
\n<\N[3]>All this fighting, just rattled around a few memories.
\n<\N[5]>You wanna know the secret behind your names?
\n<\N[3]>I thought, they were our birth names.
\n<\N[5]>No, they died before they could tell me.
\n<\N[5]>When I saw your faces, I thought each of you were the sweetest things I had ever seen.
\n<\N[5]>The sooner you sort out this mess out, the better.
\n<\N[5]>Ahhh, sorry there bonnie lass, I thought you left already.
\n<\N[5]>*whisper* If only their parents were alive to see them now. *whisper*
\n<\N[5]>Atleast they let me come back home.
\n<\N[5]>Pestering me every hour on the hour.
\n<\N[5]>Wish I could bang his lights out.
\n<\N[5]>Ohhh \C[13]Roger\C[0], I wish he was still around.
\n<\N[5]>He was a titan of a man.
\fi"...\C[13]Roger\C[0] is still in bed. No guests today."\fi
\fi"...a pregant young woman is staying, while recovering from a fever, no payment."\fi
\fi"...two children from \C[25]Civitatem\C[0] are staying while recovering from a monster raid."\fi
\fi"...for the time being the \C[25]Inn\C[0] will need to be converted to an \C[25]Orphanage\C[0], and will be accepting donations from the village."\fi
Please wash your hands, and take all your belongings before you leave.
Thank you for staying with us.
\fi"A Sorcerer like any other journeyman must practise daily, only after mastering basic casts can one take the next step forward."\fi
\n<N[1]>Hmmmm, I can't play with Ms. Buttercup.
\n<N[1]>I have more important things to do.
\n<N[1]>*thinking* Bluu's old teddy, is still chucking along. *thinking*
\n<N[1]>*thinking* Shame about the lack of fluff though. *thinking*
